alert.note: Alert for Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 11:39PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WITH STRONG WINDS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN STILLWATER AND SOUTHWESTERN YELLOWSTONE COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 AM MDT... At 1137 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 24 miles north of Columbus to near Pryor. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Brief wind gusts of 35 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Sudden cross winds will impact travel on interstate 90 from Laurel to Billings and Huntley. Locations impacted include... Billings, Laurel, Lockwood, Huntley, Shepherd, Billings Heights, Billings West End, Pryor, Broadview, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Hailstone Wildlife Refuge, Molt, Acton, and Comanche. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
